text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's my day off, so I decide to go for a<n>stroll downtown
when...

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Ah, Mama? Sorry to bother you when<n>you're busy. It's
just... I was<n>wondering about your itinerary for<n>next
month.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Mhm, mhm... Is that so? Mhm... Got it,<n>thanks! Talk to you
later!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Nice! Now that I know the hotel she's<n>going to be staying at,
I'm all set! All<n>that's left is getting a present... Hehe!<n>♪
choice_data_list: Were you on the phone with your mom?
Were you on the phone with your mom?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: T-Trainer?! What're you doingh—wait, don't tell me—were youeavesdropping? Not a veryrespectable hobby, if you ask me!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Sigh... Mama's birthday is nextmonth, so I needed to know where tosend my present.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
You know, a surprise. Whether or not<n>Mama will actually be
surprised is<n>another question though.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
I'm trying to think of the number one<n>present for her... The
present that'll<n>make her the happiest, that'll make<n>her
think, "That's my little girl!"

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
You want to help? Hm, I guess having<n>you carry my bags
would be pretty<n>nice.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Okay, I'll let you tag along. Now come<n>on, we haven't got all
day!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: And so, I decide to help Scarlet with<n>her present hunting...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: But picking a gift is proving to be<n>unexpectedly difficult.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Maybe a necklace... Hmmm. It's cute,<n>but I can't picture
Mama wearing this.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
This earring is pretty, but a little too<n>gaudy. Something a bit
more refined<n>would fit her better...

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Oh, but what if I got her clothes? Like<n>this one, it's the most
popular brand<n>name right now—

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
—but that's also all it is. You see<n>people wear this
everywhere. If it's<n>for Mama, I want something that<n>feels
more special.
choice_data_list: How about a bouquet of flowers?
How about a bouquet of flowers?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Not a bad idea... but I really want to<n>give her something with
more oomph.<n>Since it's her birthday and all, I<n>wanna make
her jump for joy.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
And to do that, I need to pick the<n>number one present for
her, a present<n>only I could think of.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Probably won't find anything else<n>here. Next up, the
shopping mall!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Hmmm. There's a lot to choose from,<n>but none of them
scream, "Mama," to<n>me.
choice_data_list: You really love your mom, huh?
You really love your mom, huh?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Of course I do! After all, Mama wasan amazing racer!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
She took home plenty of accolades<n>during her racing career,
and now she<n>travels around the world doing all<n>sorts of
work.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: She's like the Umamusumeeveryone looks up to—she'swonderful!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Mhm, that's right.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
The first time I won a race, Mama<n>wasn't there to watch,
but she still left<n>me a voicemail saying,<n>"Congratulations."

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
At the time, I was so happy... And<n>even now, she sends me
a message<n>whenever I win.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
They're always short and to the<n>point, but to me, they mean
the world.
choice_data_list: Is that why you want to be number one?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Well, something like that. I also just<n>really hate losing, but
I'm sure you<n>know that already.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Anyways, that's why I have to pick<n>out the number one
present. I won't<n>settle for anything less! So come on,<n>let's
keep looking!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
...Hmmm, I'm starting to run out of<n>ideas. Not sweets, not
accessories,<n>not shoes...

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Hey, you got any ideas over there?<n>I'll hear you out, but
just this once.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
And just so you know, cookie-cutter<n>trinkets won't cut it.
It's got to be<n>something special, something only I<n>could
give her!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Something special, that'll make her<n>happy... What would
make Scarlet's<n>mom hap—I got it!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: What? Did you think of something?
choice_data_list: You just need to win a race!
You just need to win a race!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Win a race? And that'll be my<n>present?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Hm... It might work, I guess? Mama<n>always messages me
when I win,<n>after all.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Becoming number one for Mama... So<n>I'll finish first, and
when they<n>interview me, I'll shout, "Happy<n>birthday,
Mama!"
choice_data_list: It'll be the best birthday she's ever had!
It'll be the best birthday she's ever had!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
I-it would, wouldn't it?! It might not be<n>on the exact day of
her birthday...

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
But it's definitely something unique,<n>something only I can
do. I'll give my<n>best to Mama!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
A sound idea, at least coming from<n>you. I'll give credit
where it's due.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
All right! It's decided! I'm definitely<n>winning the next race!
That's what<n>you want too, right? It's a win-win<n>situation!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Then what are we twiddling our<n>thumbs here for?! Let's go
train!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Huff, puff, huff... Phew.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
I went a little overboard back there.<n>Sweat's getting in my
eyes...

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
No, I'm only just getting started! I'm<n>feeling really
motivated!
choice_data_list: I'm sure your mom will be overjoyed.
I'm sure your mom will be overjoyed.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Mhm... That's what's keeping me<n>going.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, I should think of what to say to<n>Mama during my
victory interview!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
But for now, let's keep going, Trainer!<n>That number one
spot is as good as<n>mine, so you better put your back into<n>it
too!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Sometime later, Daiwa Scarlet<n>achieves a decisive victory,
taking<n>home the number one spot.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Right on cue, she gets a<n>congratulatory call from her mom.<n>
Picking up the phone, she lights up<n>with a pure and precious
smile on her<n>face.
